TopicTitle: My first mun and back mission

Articles.Content:
Forgive there no sound :-( i don't know why i used shadowplay but it doesnt recorded sound

And when i re-entered into Kerbin i cannot decupled engine stage despite i put decoupler beneath head shield can you tell me why this happen?


It seams to me that sample return from Minmus is easier than Mun, it's strange ?

Congratulations - first landing is no small feat.

Minmus is indeed easier - the required dV to get there is almost the same, but since it's smaller, it has a lower gravity. This means the landing and returning requires less fuel.

Congratulations - first landing is no small feat.

Minmus is indeed easier - the required dV to get there is almost the same, but since it's smaller, it has a lower gravity. This means the landing and returning requires less fuel.

I landed on Mun even Kebals on board many times but it was long time ago in 0.23 i think

The new aerodynamic make it much harder but also much fun.

You can say we "We choose to go to the Mun! We choose to go to the Mun! in this decade and do the other things, not because they are easy, but because they are hard and fun too
This report of a mission has been moved to Mission Reports.
Yes shadowplay does record sound. . . go into your shadowplay settings in GeForce Experience
Hey, congrats! Big milestone- took me ten tries to design a craft capable of getting back, and now I could do it in my sleep. Just you wait, and you'll be doing interplanetary cargo runs in no time.

Hey, congrats! Big milestone- took me ten tries to design a craft capable of getting back, and now I could do it in my sleep. Just you wait, and you'll be doing interplanetary cargo runs in no time.

Thanks
